comments.body: nit: leave comment of where magic 384Mi comes from (i.e. `128+256` from burstable-pod-1 + burstable-pod-2 memory requests).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +148,152 @@	m.setMemoryQoS(qosConfigs)

	burstableMin := resource.MustParse("384Mi")
	guaranteedMin := resource.MustParse("128Mi")
	assert.Equal(t, qosConfigs[v1.PodQOSGuaranteed].ResourceParameters.Unified["memory.min"], strconv.FormatInt(burstableMin.Value()+guaranteedMin.Value(), 10))

comments.body: nit: leave comment of where 128Mi comes from (i.e. `guaranteed-pod` memory requests).
